ARABIC: فَلَمَّا رَءَا قَمِيصَهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٍ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ مِن كَيْدِكُنَّ إِنَّ كَيْدَكُنَّ عَظِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He saw the shirt torn at the back and said, 'The source of this is women's deviousness. Without a doubt your guile is very great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When the husband saw the shirt torn at the back, he said: "Surely this is a woman's ruse, and the wiles of women are great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So when the husband saw Joseph's shirt torn from behind he exclaimed: "Surely, this is one of the tricks of you women; your tricks are indeed great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the master saw that Joseph's shirt was torn from behind, he told his wife, "This is some of your womanly guile in which you are certainly skillful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when the governor saw his shirt torn from behind, he said, “Indeed this is a deception of women; undoubtedly the deception of women is very great.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So when he (her husband) saw his [Yusuf`s] shirt torn at the back, he (her husband) said: "Surely, it is a plot of you women! Certainly mighty is your plot!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when he saw his shirt rent from behind, he said: Surely it is a guile of you women; surely your guile is great:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When he saw his shirt was torn from behind he said, 'This is of your women's guile; surely your guile is great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So when he saw his shirt torn from behind, he said: Lo! this is of the guile of you women. Lo! the guile of you is very great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So when he saw his shirt torn from behind [her husband] said, "This is the guile of you women. Your guile is great indeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So when he saw his shirt rent from behind, he said: verily it is of the guile of ye women; verily the guile of ye women is mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So when he saw that his shirt was torn from behind, he said, ‘This is [a case] of you women’s guile! Your guile is indeed great!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So when he saw his shirt,- that it was torn at the back,- (her husband) said: "Behold! It is a snare of you women! truly, mighty is your snare!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So when he (her husband) saw his [(Yusuf's (Joseph)] shirt torn at the back; (her husband) said: "Surely, it is a plot of you women! Certainly mighty is your plot!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when he saw his shirt torn at the back, he said: 'This is one of your (women's) guiles. Your guile, (O woman), is great indeed!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when he saw that his shirt was torn from the back, he said, “This is a woman's scheme. Your scheming is serious indeed.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So when her husband saw his shirt torn from the back, he said, "Indeed, it is of the women's plan. Indeed, your plan is great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:28] So when he, her husband, saw that his shirt was torn from behind, he said: ‘Indeed this — that is, your saying: ‘What is to be the requital of him who intends …’ to the end [of the verse, Q. 12:25] — is of the guile of you, O, women. Verily your guile is great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 245 (So when he saw his shirt torn from behind, he said) her brother said: (Lo! this is of the guile) the scheming and devising (of you women. Lo! the guile of you is very great) it touches the innocent and the sick.
